opening.content: how do you castle in chess
You can castle by moving the king to the middle of the board and then taking the pawns in the center row and moving them to the corner of the board.

Then you take the Bishop from
the second row and place it at the square where you want it.
Next you take the Rook from the third row and place it at the
square where you want it.
what are some historical chess games?
In my opinion, there are two main types of chess games.
There are three different types of promotion.
